channel.title: Careers at Budibase on Budibase - No code platform for creating business apps
channel.description: Recent content in Careers at Budibase on Budibase - No code platform for creating business apps

item.title: Senior Backend Engineer
item.description: Description Budibase is an open-source low code platform, designed for speed and customisation. When you need to build, launch, and grow a web application, Budibase has you covered. To date, we’ve received over 10,000 signups from the likes of F1, Deloitte, KPMG and we’re a few weeks from private beta. We have also recently secured a funding round and are seeking to expand our team in Belfast as we take our product to the next level.
